page.title: 10Shenfield Sports Hall
page.content: This hall has been provided jointly by Essex County and Brentwood District Councils.Attached to Shenfield Comprehensive School, facilities exist for a wide range of indoor sports, including table tennis, tennis, trampolining, keep_fit, karate and ju_jitsu, weight training, netball, handball and 5_a_side football. Coaching can be provided and a course of ten coached lessons for adults currently costs Â£15, while children pay Â£10. Application is made to the centre,where names are listed until vacancies occur. A trophy donated by Dr.Roger Bannister is awarded annually to an individual, team or club, who, in the opinion of the Brentwood Sports Council contributes most to the service of sport in Brentwood.
